# Template

Just my template

## Build

`docker build . `

## Tests and linters

### _Linters_
`docker run
      pre-commit run --all-files`

### _Tests_
`docker run
      python -m pytest --disable-warnings`

## Runing

`docker run
      python run.py`

## Api schema

### _Autogenerated api schema in swagger_
[https://{server_host}/docs](http://localhost/docs)


## External docs
